text: Marta Bechis (born 4 September 1989) is an Italian professional volleyball player. She plays for Italy women's national volleyball team. She participated at the 2010 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship, and 2011 FIVB World Grand Prix. == Clubs == {| !Season !Team |- |2004-2006 |2D Lingotto Torino |- |2006-2009 |Asystel |- |2009-2010 |Tiboni Urbino |- |2010-2012 |Asystel |- |2012-2013 |Chieri Torino |- |2013-2014 |Imoco |- |2014-2015 |Legionovia |- |2015 |Imoco |- |2015-2018 |San Casciano San Casciano |- |2018- |Imoco http://www.legavolleyfemminile.it/?page_id=194&idat;=BEC-MAR-89 |} == References == == External links == * FIVB profile * https://volleymob.com/ita- marta-bechis-leaves-firenze-a1s-leader-imoco-conegliano/ * http://www.legavolleyfemminile.it/?p=83628 Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Italian women's volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Turin
title: Marta Bechis
